issue.title: [Python] converted_type_name_from_enum(): Incorrect name for INT_64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7294](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7294). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The INT_64 type is converted to "UINT_64"

It should be converted to "INT_64"

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7294?focusedCommentId=16986616) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5938
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5938>
